Uses of Package
rl.sqltrainer.domain

  • Packages that use rl.sqltrainer.domain 
    Package Description
    rl.sqltrainer.application
    Contains application classes which provide a user interface independent API for the SQLTrainer.
    rl.sqltrainer.domain
    Covers aspects of domain objects, which are relevant for the SQL Trainer.
    rl.sqltrainer.gui
    Contains a Swing-based GUI for the SQL Trainer.
    rl.sqltrainer.persistence
    Provides persistence functionality for the SQL Trainer.
  • Classes in rl.sqltrainer.domain used by rl.sqltrainer.application 
    Class and Description
    Database
    Maintains all those properties of a database, which are needed by the SQLTrainer to access it properly.
    Exercise
    An exercise basically consists of an ID, a type, a theme, and a question text.
    ExerciseSet
    Represents a set of exercises.
    Feedback
    A feedback refers to a given answer and consists of a string with comments and optionally a quantitative measure of correctness.
  • Classes in rl.sqltrainer.domain used by rl.sqltrainer.domain 
    Class and Description
    Exercise
    An exercise basically consists of an ID, a type, a theme, and a question text.
    Exercise.Type
    Currently, only two types are supported.
  • Classes in rl.sqltrainer.domain used by rl.sqltrainer.gui 
    Class and Description
    Exercise
    An exercise basically consists of an ID, a type, a theme, and a question text.
    ExerciseSet
    Represents a set of exercises.
  • Classes in rl.sqltrainer.domain used by rl.sqltrainer.persistence 
    Class and Description
    Exercise
    An exercise basically consists of an ID, a type, a theme, and a question text.
    ExerciseSet
    Represents a set of exercises.
